text: 🚨新しいレポートが明らかに！🤯 US Healthcare Affordability Crisis：36%の人々は、支払不可能性により治療を延期している。 PayZen Report revealed that Americans can only afford a monthly payment of $97 for out-of-pocket medical expenses. 💸🤔 This is unacceptable! Everyone deserves access to quality healthcare, regardless of their ability to pay. 🌎💕 We need to keep pushing for progress and fight for a more equitable healthcare system.
